did.unittitle: Sections I (Old Age, p. 1-21, complete) and II (Decrepitude, p. 1-26, complete)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Probably the last draft. Lightly edited, with penciled brackets, presumably by Arnow, to show proposed cuts. Blue felt-tip pen markings by Marcella Arnow.
